Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA/transport dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

ObjectStorage.Usage: Stores originals and generated variants (thumbnail, web-optimized)
ObjectStorage.Access: Signed URLs with TTL for protected assets

Messaging.Pattern: Transactional outbox for outbound events; idempotent consumers.

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; ADMIN for upload/link; SERVICE for resolve; signed URL TTL for clients.

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; metrics: upload latency, resolve latency, storage failures.
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (MEDIA-UPLOAD-*, MEDIA-RESOLVE-*) for belief-state tracing.

Resilience.Retries: Retries with backoff for storage/Kafka where idempotent

Testing.Contract: OpenAPI for REST; AsyncAPI/Avro for media.updated
Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
